html: I hate when I see people in a position of power abuse that power (no matter how small it is). Power I have learned through failure and success comes with a responsibility to serve others. Do better @AmericanAir
text: I hate when I see people in a position of power abuse that power (no matter how small it is). Power I have learned through failure and success comes with a responsibility to serve others. Do better @AmericanAir

html: The good news it wasn’t the airplane staff @AmericanAir .. they were great. But one staff member at the gate tried (why I have no idea) to display the characteristics that are just shameful. But we didn’t let them win the day. Do better @AmericanAir it shouldn’t be on us to help.
text: The good news it wasn’t the airplane staff @AmericanAir .. they were great. But one staff member at the gate tried (why I have no idea) to display the characteristics that are just shameful. But we didn’t let them win the day. Do better @AmericanAir it shouldn’t be on us to help.

html: Sometimes people are just cruel to be cruel. @AmericanAir today I witnessed your gate staff display that disappointing behavior. They weren’t there to help someone they were there to make someone’s life difficult for no reason. The good news?... we didn’t let it happen.
text: Sometimes people are just cruel to be cruel. @AmericanAir today I witnessed your gate staff display that disappointing behavior. They weren’t there to help someone they were there to make someone’s life difficult for no reason. The good news?... we didn’t let it happen.
